module.name: skrill
module.description: Skrill, który cieszy się zaufaniem milionów osób na całym świecie, wychodzi naprzeciw potrzebom ponad 156 000 firm, oferując wygodny i bezpieczny sposób wysyłania oraz otrz
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Skrill, który cieszy się zaufaniem milionów osób na całym świecie, wychodzi naprzeciw potrzebom ponad 156 000 firm, oferując wygodny i bezpieczny sposób wysyłania oraz otrzymywania pieniędzy w niemal 200 krajach i 40 walutach.
module.additional_description: Bezpłatna i szybka konfiguracjaDostęp do ponad 100 lokalnych rozwiązań płatniczych w ramach 1 łatwej integracjiŁączność z ponad 30 milionami posiadaczy rachunku SkrillNajwyższe standardy bezpieczeństwa i technologia zapobiegająca nadużyciom finansowymPłynny sposób realizacji płatności za pomocą telefonu komórkowego, tabletu i komputera

module.name: paypal
module.description: Korzystaj z kompleksowej platformy PayPal do przetwarzania płatności i rozwijaj swoją krajową i międzynarodową działalność handlową w Internecie i na urządzeniach mobilnych
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Korzystaj z kompleksowej platformy PayPal do przetwarzania płatności i rozwijaj swoją krajową i międzynarodową działalność handlową w Internecie i na urządzeniach mobilnych.
module.additional_description: Łatwa aktywacja: Z systemem PayPal możesz niemal natychmiast zacząć odbierać płatności bez żadnych opłat za uruchomienie usługi! Nasze zoptymalizowane rozwiązania mobilne pozwolą Ci zwiększyć współczynnik konwersji nawet do 87,5%* i nie wymagają dodatkowej integracji. A dzięki funkcji One Touch™ kupujący mogą płacić za zakupy jeszcze szybciej niż dotychczas! Program ochrony sprzedających: Chroń swoje dochody przed internetowymi oszustwami, korzystając z ochrony sprzedających w systemie PayPal. Ochronie tej mogą podlegać zarówno artykuły materialne, jak i niematerialne, a także większość usług. Przejrzyste zasady dotyczące opłat gwarantują, że nie spotkają Cię żadne niespodzianki. Brak ukrytych opłat. Prowizja jest naliczana tylko podczas odbierania płatności. Im więcej płatności otrzymujesz, tym mniej Cię to kosztuje. * Współczynnik konwersji z użyciem funkcji One Touch™ obliczono w IV kwartale 2015 r. w ramach badania comScore. Próba użytkowników ze Stanów Zjednoczonych.

module.name: prestafraud
module.description: Protect your store from fraudulent payments
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Protect your store from fraudulent payments

module.name: autoupgrade
module.description: Upgrade your shop to the latest version of PrestaShop in a few clicks, thanks to this automated method
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Upgrade your shop to the latest version of PrestaShop in a few clicks, thanks to this automated method. By running the most recent version of PrestaShop, you will benefit from the latest features and improvements available. For this reason (and for your shop security) it is always recommended to use an up-to-date version.
module.additional_description: The easiest way to upgrade your PrestaShop store!

module.name: gamification
module.description: Zostań ekspertem e-commerce w mgnieniu oka!
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Zostań ekspertem e-commerce w mgnieniu oka!

module.name: gadwords
module.description: Pokaż swój do Do ludzi w tym samym momencie, gdy szukają tego, co oferujesz
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Pokaż swój do Do ludzi w tym samym momencie, gdy szukają tego, co oferujesz. Google i PrestaShop Zwiększenie inwestycji w reklamę poprzez oferowanie € 75 po raz pierwszy spędził € 25!  Pobierz moduł, aby uzyskać kod promocyjny i rozpocząć kampanię teraz!
module.additional_description: Zacznij wyświetlać reklamy w Google Przedstaw swoją ofertę klientom dokładnie w momencie, w którym szukają jej w Google. Zapłacisz tylko wtedy, gdy klikną reklamę i odwiedzą stronę Twojej firmy. Bezpłatna pomoc telefoniczna: 800 253 500

module.name: sendinblue
module.description: SendinBlue: kompleksowy moduł do zarządzania e-mailami oraz marketingiem mobilnym SM﻿ Dzięki modułowi SendinBlue teraz możesz łatwo i skutecznie wysyłać kampanie e-mailowe i SMS-owe do potencjalnych,
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: SendinBlue: kompleksowy moduł do zarządzania e-mailami oraz marketingiem mobilnym SM﻿ Dzięki modułowi SendinBlue teraz możesz łatwo i skutecznie wysyłać kampanie e-mailowe i SMS-owe do potencjalnych, jak i obecnych klientów.
module.additional_description: With SendinBlue, you can:Automatically synchronize your contacts on SendinBlue and pull up your salesCreate and send beautiful newslettersOptimize deliverability in inbox of your transactional mails (subscription, order confirmation, etc.)Follow results of your sendings in real timeEnjoy of a dedicated customer service, by phone or EmailSee our tutorial : https://resources.sendinblue.com/en/plugin-prestashop/

module.name: dateofdelivery
module.description: Wyświetla przybliżoną datę dostawy
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Wyświetla przybliżoną datę dostawy

module.name: newsletter
module.description: Generuje plik
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Generuje plik .CSV dla masowego wysyłania e-mail

module.name: pscleaner
module.description: Sprawdź i popraw problemy z integralnością funkcjonalną oraz usuń domyślne dane
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Sprawdź i popraw problemy z integralnością funkcjonalną oraz usuń domyślne dane

module.name: sofortbanking
module.description: Direct payment via online banking. Easy, quick and secure – without registration
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Direct payment via online banking. Easy, quick and secure – without registration. Automatic data transfer and the real-time transaction notification enable a smooth payment process and a faster delivery.
module.additional_description: Attractive- Cost savings through low fees- Credited funds are irreversible- Low default risk- Low storage costs thanks to short processing times Easy- Automated and transparent processes- Easy integration thanks to more than 100 plug-ins for standardized shop systems as well as an efficient API for individual shop systems- Convenient for your customers as they can use their online banking details- No eWallet and thus no registration required for your customers Fast- Funds are transferred directly from customer’s online banking account to your bank account- Real-time transaction notification after the transfer has been listed- All within one process - faster than advanced payment (by bank transfer)- Fast cash flow, high liquidity Secure- Data is transferred in an encrypted form via secured connections- Payment system certified by TÜV Saarland with a certified data protection (TÜV Saarland is a German, state-approved monitoring body for the inspection and maintenance of security standards)- Data processing center in Germany in accordance with strict banking standards

module.name: dashgoals
module.description: Adds a block with your store's forecast
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adds a block with your store's forecast.

module.name: dashproducts
module.description: Dodaje blok z tabelą najnowszych zamówień i ranking Twoich produktów
module.author: PrestaShop

module.name: dashtrends
module.description: Dodaje blok z graficznym wykresem zmian podstawowych danych Twojego sklepu bazującym na wybranych kluczowych danych
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Dodaje blok z graficznym wykresem zmian podstawowych danych Twojego sklepu bazującym na wybranych kluczowych danych.

module.name: graphnvd3
module.description: This module enables the NVD3 charting code for your own uses, providing you with ever so useful graphs. It is required by other dashboard modules. NVD3 (http://nvd3
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: This module enables the NVD3 charting code for your own uses, providing you with ever so useful graphs. It is required by other dashboard modules. NVD3 (http://nvd3.org/) is JavaScript library that was built specifically to generate beautiful charts using D3.js (http://d3js.org/), a JavaScript library built to manipulate documents based on data.

module.name: gridhtml
module.description: This module allows the PrestaShop statistics pages to display data in a grid. It is required by statistics modules
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: This module allows the PrestaShop statistics pages to display data in a grid. It is required by statistics modules.

module.name: pagesnotfound
module.description: Dodaje zakładkę do panelu Statystyk, zobaczysz strony odwiedzających które nie zostały odnalezione
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Dodaje zakładkę do panelu Statystyk, zobaczysz strony odwiedzających które nie zostały odnalezione.
module.additional_description: This page tells you which pages of your catalog people have attempted to access but could not find (resulting in what is called "HTTP 404" errors). This is useful for finding potential technical problems that may hinder your sales.

module.description: Displays which keywords have led visitors to your website

module.author: PrestaShop

module.description: Zarządzanie wszystkimi zautomatyzowanymi zadaniami internetowymi z poziomu jednego interfejsu
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Zarządzanie wszystkimi zautomatyzowanymi zadaniami internetowymi z poziomu jednego interfejsu.

module.name: cartsguru
module.displayName: Carts Guru | Abandoned Cart Solution | Free Trial
module.description: PrestaShop has chosen Carts Guru as a native retargeting solution for cart abandonment. Carts Guru is the all-in-one Retargeting Solution
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: PrestaShop has chosen Carts Guru as a native retargeting solution for cart abandonment. Carts Guru is the all-in-one Retargeting Solution. Use Emails, SMS, Facebook Messenger, Facebook Ads to convert more than 20% of lost customers into sales.
module.additional_description: Carts Guru will help you to convert your "almost buyers" into paying customers. Multichannel Retargeting: Emails, Facebook Ads, Facebook Messenger and SMS.Convert more than 20% of your abandoned cartsAutomatic suggestions to continuously improve your rules Carts Guru is your all-in-one retargeting solution. Try it for free for 14 days, no credit card needed. You only pay a commission when Carts Guru converts your carts. Check our website: https://carts.guru/en/prestashop

module.name: blockreassurance
module.description: Adds an information block aimed at offering helpful information to reassure customers that your store is trustworthy
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adds an information block aimed at offering helpful information to reassure customers that your store is trustworthy.

module.name: ps_banner
module.description: Displays a banner on your shop. ​With the default theme Classic, it appears at the bottom of the homepage
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Displays a banner on your shop. ​With the default theme Classic, it appears at the bottom of the homepage.
module.additional_description: ​Use this space to promote your seasonal offers or some important section of your shop!

module.name: ps_categorytree
module.description: Shows the current category and subcategories in a block on the left column of your shop. ​It is useful to navigate the category pages and visualize the subcategories
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Shows the current category and subcategories in a block on the left column of your shop. ​It is useful to navigate the category pages and visualize the subcategories.
module.additional_description: ​Makes it easier for your customer to navigate your shop and see available subcategories.

module.name: ps_contactinfo
module.description: Add contact information in the header and footer of your store
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Add contact information in the header and footer of your store.In the header: either the "Call us" information or a "Contact us" link (redirecting to the contact page)In the footer: your shop's name, address and contact information
module.additional_description: Contact information is essential for a shop as it is part of what reassure the customers. Visitors will know they can join you through the medium of their choice, so do not hesitate to provide your contact details if you want your customers to reach you!

module.name: ps_customersignin
module.description: Adds a block that displays information about the customer
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adds a block that displays information about the customer.

module.name: ps_customtext
module.description: Display custom blocks of rich text in one zone, usually on the homepage. Thanks to hooks, you can display this block anywhere in your shop
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Display custom blocks of rich text in one zone, usually on the homepage. Thanks to hooks, you can display this block anywhere in your shop. For instance, you can use this block of text to make a short presentation of your brand on your homepage.
module.additional_description: ​By providing information to your customers, this block of text can help you both in your content strategy and your search engine optimization.

module.name: ps_emailsubscription
module.description: Adds a form for newsletter subscription
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adds a form for newsletter subscription.

module.name: ps_featuredproducts
module.description: Displays featured products in the central column of your homepage. With this module, you can choose which products to highlight by placing them on your homepage
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Displays featured products in the central column of your homepage. With this module, you can choose which products to highlight by placing them on your homepage.

module.name: ps_imageslider
module.description: This module adds a slider block on your homepage's central column, where you can define a set of images that will be displayed one after the other, with a sliding motion
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: This module adds a slider block on your homepage's central column, where you can define a set of images that will be displayed one after the other, with a sliding motion.
module.additional_description: Increase the visibility of chosen products or offersEnhance customer experience by displaying a lively homepage with a professional look

module.name: ps_mainmenu
module.description: Adds a new menu to the top of your e-commerce website
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adds a new menu to the top of your e-commerce website.

module.name: ps_sharebuttons
module.description: Displays social media sharing buttons (Twitter, Facebook, Google+ and Pinterest) on every product page
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Displays social media sharing buttons (Twitter, Facebook, Google+ and Pinterest) on every product page.

module.name: ps_socialfollow
module.description: Allows you to add information about your brand's social networking accounts
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Allows you to add information about your brand's social networking accounts.

module.name: welcome
module.description: Help the user to create his first product
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Help the user to create his first product.

module.name: ps_legalcompliance
module.description: This module helps merchants comply with applicable e-commerce laws
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: This module helps merchants comply with applicable e-commerce laws.

module.name: ps_checkpayment
module.description: This module allows you to accept payments by check
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: This module allows you to accept payments by check.

module.name: ps_currencyselector
module.description: Shows a currency selector in the header of your shop when several currencies are available to a customer
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Shows a currency selector in the header of your shop when several currencies are available to a customer.

module.name: ps_customeraccountlinks
module.description: Displays a block with links relative to a user's account
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Displays a block with links relative to a user's account.

module.name: ps_facetedsearch
module.description: Displays a block allowing multiple filters
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Displays a block allowing multiple filters.

module.name: ps_languageselector
module.description: Adds a block allowing customers to select a language for your store's content
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adds a block allowing customers to select a language for your store's content.

module.name: ps_searchbar
module.description: Adds a quick search field to your website
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adds a quick search field to your website.

module.name: ps_shoppingcart
module.description: The cart summary is an essential step before closing a sale. This module adds a block with the customer's cart content
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: The cart summary is an essential step before closing a sale. This module adds a block with the customer's cart content. It displays the number of products in the cart, with a summary, and acts as an entry point to the checkout.
module.additional_description: ​Remind your customer what they are about to purchase.

module.name: ps_wirepayment
module.description: Accept payments by bank transfer. Your customers will be able to pay their orders by wire payment
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Accept payments by bank transfer. Your customers will be able to pay their orders by wire payment. At the last step of the checkout, it will indicate to which account the payment should be transferred. This information will also be sent together with the confirmation email. The order will not be validated right away. You will have to change its status to "Payment received" when you actually received the payment.
module.additional_description: Adds an additional payment method to provide more flexibility to your customers.

module.name: wirecardceecheckoutseamless
module.description: Integrate all the payment methods you need into your online shop quickly and without any red tape
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Integrate all the payment methods you need into your online shop quickly and without any red tape.
module.additional_description: As a merchant based in Europe, offer your customers all over the world the opportunity to pay securely and conveniently at your online shop.  All standard payment methods (card payment, alternative methods incl. purchase on account with payment guarantee)Simple integrationAdditional premium servicesComprehensive support (via email, live chat, telephone)For merchants of all sizes and across all industriesIncluding fraud preventionPersonal merchant loginDetailed reportingOne interface for all payment methodsSolutions for your point of sale (POS, mPOS9)All the benefits of Wirecard AG (risk management, full banking licence, PCI certification)

module.name: ps_linklist
module.description: Display links to your static pages (CMS and more) in left or right blocks in your shop's columns. You can configure this module with the "Link Widget" page from the Design section
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Display links to your static pages (CMS and more) in left or right blocks in your shop's columns. You can configure this module with the "Link Widget" page from the Design section.
module.additional_description: ​Give more visibility to your pages, where you want and when you want.

module.name: ps_emailalerts
module.description: This module allows you to send e-mail notifications to customers and receive notifications regarding stock and order modifications
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: This module allows you to send e-mail notifications to customers and receive notifications regarding stock and order modifications.

module.name: ps_advertising
module.description: Adds an advertisement block to selected sections of your e-commerce website. It lets you add some advertisement on your shop
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adds an advertisement block to selected sections of your e-commerce website. It lets you add some advertisement on your shop. You can choose to advertize some specific section of your shop, some seasonal offers, or use this space for other advertising purposes.
module.additional_description: Your own advertising space with your own rules.

module.name: ps_bestsellers
module.description: Adds a block displaying your store's top-selling products. The module adds a list of top-selling products at the bottom of your homepage, and creates a page dedicated to your top sellers
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adds a block displaying your store's top-selling products. The module adds a list of top-selling products at the bottom of your homepage, and creates a page dedicated to your top sellers.
module.additional_description: Showcase your top-selling products to boost your sales.

module.name: ps_categoryproducts
module.description: Adds a block on the product page that displays products from the same category
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adds a block on the product page that displays products from the same category.

module.name: ps_productinfo
module.description: Shows information on a product page: how many people are viewing it, the last time it was sold and the last time it was added to a cart
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Shows information on a product page: how many people are viewing it, the last time it was sold and the last time it was added to a cart.

module.description_full: Accept cash on delivery payments

module.description: Adds a block displaying a RSS feed
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adds a block displaying a RSS feed.

module.description: Displays a block listing product brands
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Displays a block listing product brands.

module.name: ps_newproducts
module.description: Displays a block featuring your store's newest products
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Displays a block featuring your store's newest products.

module.name: ps_specials
module.description: Displays your products that are currently on sale in a dedicated block
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Displays your products that are currently on sale in a dedicated block.

module.description: Adds a block with a list of your product suppliers on your shop
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adds a block with a list of your product suppliers on your shop.

module.name: ps_viewedproduct
module.description: Adds a block displaying recently viewed products
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adds a block displaying recently viewed products.

module.name: ps_crossselling
module.description: Adds a "Customers who bought this product also bought..." section to every product page
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adds a "Customers who bought this product also bought..." section to every product page.

module.name: ps_dataprivacy
module.description: Adds a block displaying your data privacy policy in customer account creation forms. Activate it for more transparency and reassurance
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adds a block displaying your data privacy policy in customer account creation forms. Activate it for more transparency and reassurance.
module.additional_description: Be transparent with your customers by telling them exactly what you do (and don't) with their private data.

module.name: ps_feeder
module.description: This module generates a RSS feed for your latest products. A RSS feed is a website content syndication format, which enables anyone to display the latest content from a website on another
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: This module generates a RSS feed for your latest products. A RSS feed is a website content syndication format, which enables anyone to display the latest content from a website on another. In case of a multistore installation, you can display the new products from one shop, right in the sidebar of another of your shop using its RSS Feed Block module. If you would rather not have your content be available to anyone online, disable this module.
module.additional_description: Increase your sales: with this module, loyal customers will be able to get regular updates about products added to your catalog, by adding this feed to their own feed reader, without the need to subscribe to your newsletterImprove your SEO: search engines may use it to discover your new contentIncrease traffic: other websites will be able to display your new products on their page

module.name: ps_reminder
module.description: Follow-up with your customers with daily customized e-mails. This module enables you to create e-mail alerts for your customers
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Follow-up with your customers with daily customized e-mails. This module enables you to create e-mail alerts for your customers. It gives you a way to automatically send discount vouchers to some of your customers.
module.additional_description: Recapture lost sales with reminders on canceled cartsIncrease customer loyalty by sending vouchers to a customer that reaches a given amount of ordersIncentivize re-purchase by sending vouchers to who customer who only ordered once and did not come back to your siteReward first-time customers by sending them a voucher after their first validated order

module.name: worldfirst
module.description: World First – International Payments for Your BusinessInternational payments and foreign exchange solutions for businesses and online marketplace sellers
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: World First – International Payments for Your BusinessInternational payments and foreign exchange solutions for businesses and online marketplace sellers.
module.additional_description: WorldFirst help you make international money transfers quickly, securely and at fantastic exchange rates, which could save you money compared to your bank or online marketplace. So if you need to pay overseas suppliers or repatriate earnings from international marketplaces like Amazon, Newegg or Cdiscount, WorldFirst can help. Click the button in the panel to register your interest with WorldFirst and a member of their team will be in touch to discuss opening an account. Please note this service is available in English, French, Dutch, Chinese and Japanese.

module.name: ps_googleanalytics
module.description: Gain clear insights into important metrics about your customers, using Google Analytics
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Gain clear insights into important metrics about your customers, using Google Analytics

module.name: recolize
module.description: Personalizacja jest nieodzownym elementem każdego PrestaShopu. Maksimum zysków, minimum wysiłku
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Personalizacja jest nieodzownym elementem każdego PrestaShopu. Maksimum zysków, minimum wysiłku. Dziecinnie proste dzięki Recolize! Korzystaj bezpłatnie – nie potrzeba karty kredytowej.
module.additional_description: Czy wiesz, że większość odwiedzających Twój sklep opuszcza go bez żadnej interakcji?Zoptymalizuj ruch na stronie dzięki w pełni zautomatyzowanym spersonalizowanym rekomendacjom produktów i zaciekaw swoich klientów odpowiednimi produktami we właściwym czasie. Twoi klienci podziękują Ci poprzez nawet czterokrotnie większy współczynnik konwersjidodatkowy dochód na poziomie nawet do 20%.zwiększenie średniej wartości zamówienia Rozpocznij już teraz bezpłatne korzystanie z rozwiązania „plug & play” Recolize.Opłaty uzależnione od sukcesu – po 300 bezpłatnych kliknięć rekomendacji na miesiąc płacisz jedynie 0,039€ za kliknięcie.

module.name: ekomiratingsandreviews
module.description: Seamlessly integrate eKomi seller and product review collection with your Prestashop account
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Seamlessly integrate eKomi seller and product review collection with your Prestashop account. Review requests are automatically triggered from your shop backend, and any product reviews will be displayed automatically on corresponding product pages.
module.additional_description: eKomi is the leading third-party review service, specializing in the collection, management and publishing of seller and product reviews and ratings for businesses. Thanks to our constant innovation and market-leading technology, we offer the most varied and flexible review generation methods, allowing you to reach all your clients to pro-actively request their feedback.Automatically collect and display authentic seller and product ratings and reviews.Increase trust in your business and boost customer loyalty to increase sales.Activate your Seller Rating Extension to display stars on your Google Ads and increase your Click-through-rate by 17%.Drive more qualified traffic to your siteIncentivise further purchases with our integrated coupon feature.Decrease returns by displaying product reviews on your corresponding product pages.Overall, the more ratings you get for your business, the more traffic you drive to your site, the more trust you create among current and potential clients, and the more you will boost your sales and ROI - so get started today!

module.name: psaddonsconnect
module.description: 2 w 1: zapewnij swojemu sklepowi podwójną korzyść dzięki aktualizacjom bezpieczeństwa i funkcjonalnym oraz przesyłanym co tydzień poradom dotyczącym e-commerce
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: 2 w 1: zapewnij swojemu sklepowi podwójną korzyść dzięki aktualizacjom bezpieczeństwa i funkcjonalnym oraz przesyłanym co tydzień poradom dotyczącym e-commerce.
module.additional_description: Po połączeniu swojego konta w PrestaShop Addons z tym modułem:Będziemy przesyłać Ci co tydzień porady dotyczące e-commerce bądź przydatne triki związane z kalendarzem e-handlu. Zobaczysz je w swoim kokpicie (np. jak i kiedy rozpocząć przygotowania do Black Friday, początku roku szkolnego itp.);  Chroń swój sklep, będąc cały czas na bieżąco z najnowszymi aktualizacjami bezpieczeństwa dla modułów pobranych z PrestaShop Addons;  Korzystaj z nowych funkcji dodawanych do modułów pobranych w serwisie PrestaShop Addons.
